item.description:
Come join us for our second annual Yule Celebration with the Central Mass Wiccan Meet-Up in Warren Mass!

We will start the celebration with the Battle of the Oak and Holly King
as we go from the Dark half of the year into the Light half of the year.

There will be an informative Yule discussion on where, and how our Christmas customs originated from earlier pagan ones, what the Sabbat is all about, why we have the Battle of the Oak and Holly King and ways to celebrate Yule in style!

There will be a pot luck feast with homemade lasanga, garden salad, and garlic bread, and more,
along with yummy desserts!

We will be doing "pagan" Yankee swap- Anyone who would like to participate is asked to bring a
pagan gift $15.00- $20.00 as well carving wishes in a traditional yule log that will be burned on Yule.

Pot luck sign up will be put up on the list about a week before the meet up-

This is a meet-up that will prove to be tons of fun, and a good way to bring in the light
to celebrate the Winter Solstice!

Please note, if you are on the Central Mass Meet up group also, please rsvp on one site only for an accurate count of people :)


House phone: 413-436-0191
cell phone; 978-852-1478
Directions on mapquest.com are accurate.
The house is a big white house, black roof with a red door and a "for sale" sign in the front of the house.


For more information you can call Tala at: (508) 847-7677
item.name: 2nd Annual Yule Party
